list_definition.definition: to keep from changing, being damaged or lost

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We must conserve the country’s natural resources
This old building should be conserved.

list_definition.definition: something preserved, eg fruits in sugar, jam etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: a jar of black cherry conserve.
